General.Name: PNC Process Systems Co Ltd
General.Description: PNC Process Systems Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells semiconductor process equipment, system integration and support equipment, and component materials in China. The company operates in System Integration and Materials; and Equipment Business segments. It provides component materials and professional services, including the supply of equipment components, bulk gas station, component cleaning, wafer regeneration, and wafer factory on-site services. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Shanghai, China.
